WorkItem.Description: As the title says, i got an error while i tryed to load my Enhancement Shaman character..
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Error while trying to load a saved char

Comments.Message:
I tryed the second possibility, and it worked.. Thank you for your help..
But if i may ask.. How come it suddenly missed a line?

I added Intellect to the options your file only had 9 tick boxes for what graph to show with intellect there are now 10, so it was missing what to set it too. The next version should take care of this automatically, but to save you waiting I felt it was better to give you a solution now.
